name: Rouge Connection
description:
You are connected to a red weird ball, and all people wants to break it, what happens if it breaks ?

Made during LD46 - 18-04-2020 to 21-04-2020, where the theme was "Keep it Alive".

Controls: ZQSD or WASD or Arrows direction for movement, and to throw the red weird ball, put the mouse position towards the location where you want to throw it, and press left click !

Credits:

- Music: Red Ant - Quincas Moreira (Youtube Royalty music)

- Feedback sounds: Made with Bfxr
